attributes.action: Allow National Park Rangers in the UK to use Blue Lights!
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Government

National Park Rangers are special people who look after everything we savoir as beautiful, relaxing, quiet and special environments within the UK.

In addition they have extra responsibilities of dealing with incidents on a regular basis such as casualty care(similar to Mountain Rescue), moorland and wild fires as well as wildlife crime.

In general Rangers are normally always the closest people available to these incidents who are trained and competent to deal with them.

They were once able to use Blue Lights before and they should be included again to use blue lights as per other emergency services on organisation vehicles or personal vehicles (like first res- ponders) in the light of the amount of Ranger volunteers subject to  their insurance of course.

Please give consideration to Rangers using blue lights without noise. Thank You for reading.
